items.summary: Redesign the Landing page hero section with a solid vivid purple (#7B2FFF or similar) full-viewport background, replacing the current dark/near-black gradient and scroll-driven color transitions.

Replace the current Web3Blob/ScrollDriven3DScene blob with a large, centrally placed iridescent morphing blob rendered in React Three Fiber. The blob should display vibrant multicolor gradients (pink, teal, yellow, orange) with a glossy/reflective surface, positioned at the center of the hero and rendered on top of the purple background.

Display the app's hero headline text (large, bold, white, sans-serif) centered horizontally across the hero section, overlapping the blob in the z-axis so the blob appears behind or through the text — matching the large typographic treatment in the reference image.

Add a minimal top navigation bar with the app name on the left and at least one nav link on the right (e.g., 'About'), styled in white text on the purple background — matching the sparse navigation shown in the reference image.

Add a circular rotating badge/label element below the blob (similar to the circular text ring reading 'CREATE AND MINT YOUR NFT · DONATE FOR A GOOD CAUSE ·' in the reference), adapted to the app's context (e.g., fitness/fashion tagline), with a small star or sparkle icon at center.
